prolog.publisher: OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards)

keywords.indexterm: outputs supported by DITA Open Toolkit HTML Help
targets supported by DITA Open Toolkit HTML Help

section.p: HTML help is a compiled help system.
HTML Help is one of the DITA Open Toolkit target outputs. If you plan to publish HTML Help, the HTML Help compiler must be installed in your DITA processing environment.
